prompts.title: Trapping Rain Water
prompts.description: Given n non-negative integers representing an elevation map where the width of each bar is 1, compute how much water it can trap after raining.

examples.explanation: The elevation map is represented by array [0,1,0,2,1,0,1,3,2,1,2,1]. In this case, 6 units of rain water are being trapped.
The elevation map is represented by array [4,2,0,3,2,5]. In this case, 9 units of rain water are being trapped.
